name: Rapid Restore
effect: 2x restore rate for all skills, except Hitpoints and Prayer

name: Protect Item
effect: Keep one extra item upon death

name: Mystic Lore
effect: +10% Magic Attack and Defence. +1% Magic damage

name: Protect from Magic
effect: 100% protection from magic attacks by NPCs, 40% from players

name: Protect from Missiles
effect: 100% protection from ranged attacks by NPCs, 40% from players

name: Protect from Melee
effect: 100% protection from melee attacks by NPCs, 40% from players

name: Mystic Might
effect: +15% Magic Attack and Defence, and +2% Magic damage

name: Retribution
effect: Upon death, deals damage up to 25% of the player's base Prayer level to targets in a 3x3 radius

name: Redemption
effect: Heals the player by 25% of their base Prayer level if they fall below 10% health, draining their prayer points fully

name: Smite
effect: Reduces the opponent's prayer points by 25% of damage dealt

name: Deadeye
effect: +18% Ranged attack, +18% Ranged Strength, and +5% Defence

name: Mystic Vigour
effect: +18% Magic Attack and Defence, +5% Defence, and +3% Magic damage

name: Rigour
effect: +20% Ranged attack, +23% Ranged Strength, and +25% Defence

name: Augury
effect: +25% Magic Attack and Defence, +25% Defence, and +4% Magic damage
